sect1.title: Installation of GNOME
sect1.para: Our LiveCD, available from www.gnome.org, allows you to try a full GNOME desktop on Linux without installing anything on your hard drive. This is the best way to see the latest GNOME for yourself.
For actual use, we recommend that you install official packages, such as those for your Linux distribution.

However, if you would like to build GNOME from source code, to test the very latest versions, to provide feedback and improvements, we recommend a build tool; such as the GARNOME utility, for building from released tarballs, and jhbuild, for building from CVS.
